name: Mrs._Annesley
description: Mrs. Annesley is Georgiana's companion at Pemberley

name: Elizabeth_Bennet
description: The novel’s protagonist. The second daughter of Mr. Bennet, Elizabeth is the most intelligent and sensible of the five Bennet sisters

name: Jane_Bennet
description: The eldest and most beautiful Bennet sister. Jane is more reserved and gentler than Elizabeth.

name: Lydia_Bennet
description: The youngest Bennet sister, she is gossipy, immature, and self-involved. Unlike Elizabeth, Lydia flings herself headlong into romance and ends up running off with Wickham.

name: Kitty_Bennet
description: The fourth Bennet sister. Like Lydia, she is girlishly enthralled with the soldiers.

name: Mary_Bennet
description: The middle Bennet sister, bookish and pedantic.

name: Mrs._Bennet
description: Mr. Bennet’s wife, a foolish, noisy woman whose only goal in life is to see her daughters married.

name: Mr._Bennet
description: The patriarch of the Bennet family, a gentleman of modest income with five unmarried daughters.

name: Mr._Bingley
description: Darcy’s considerably wealthy best friend.

name: Caroline_Bingley
description: Bingley’s snobbish sister. Miss Bingley bears inordinate disdain for Elizabeth’s middle-class background.

name: Charlotte
description: Elizabeth's sensible and intelligent friend, who disappoints Elizabeth by marrying Mr. Collins for money and security.

name: Mr._Collins
description: A pompous, generally idiotic clergyman who stands to inherit Mr. Bennet’s property.

name: Lady_Catherine
description: A rich, bossy noblewoman; Mr. Collins’s patron and Darcy’s aunt.

name: Mr._Denny
description: Mr. Denny is a soldier in the regiment who introduces the Bennet girls to Mr. Wickham.

name: Mr._Darcy
description: A wealthy gentleman, the master of Pemberley, and the nephew of Lady Catherine de Bourgh.

name: Georgiana_Darcy
description: Darcy's sister Georgiana, ten years his junior, is quiet and shy but generally amiable and good-natured.

name: Colonel_Fitzwilliam
description: Darcy's well-mannered and pleasant cousin, who is interested in Elizabeth, but who needs to marry someone with money.

name: Colonel_Forster
description: A good-natured and basically responsible man, Colonel Forster is the regiment leader who allows his wife to bring Lydia to Brighton.

name: Mrs._Gardiner
description: Mrs. Bennet’s brother's wife.

name: Mr._Gardiner
description: Mrs. Bennet’s brother.

name: Mrs._Jenkinson
description: Miss de Bough's companion. She pampers the young girl.

name: Miss_Mary_King
description: Wickham pursues Miss King, a woman in Meryton, after she inherits a sum of money.

name: Lady_Lucas
description: Charlotte's mother and the Bennets' neighbor.

name: Maria_Lucas
description: Charlotte's younger sister, Maria, is as empty-headed as her father.

name: Mr._Hurst
description: Bingley's snobbish brother-in-law.

name: Louisa_Hurst
description: Bingley's snobbish elder sister

name: Mr._Philips
description: A country attorney (his wife is Mrs. Bennet's sister).

name: Mrs._Reynolds
description: Mrs. Reynolds is the estate's longtime housekeeper. She gives Elizabeth and the Gardiners a tour of Pemberley and impresses Elizabeth with her praise of Darcy.

name: Sir_William
description: Charlotte's father and the Bennets' neighbor.

name: Anne_de_Bourgh
description: Lady Catherine's sickly, bland daughter.

name: Mr._Wickham
description: A handsome, fortune-hunting militia officer.

name: Mrs._Philips
description: Mrs. Bennet's sister, wife of a country attorney.
